title: AJDIGITAL Automation Hub Environment Variables
description: Environment variable schema for the automation hub orchestration system

FIREBASE_ADMIN_PROJECT_ID.description: Firebase Admin SDK project ID for server-side operations

FIREBASE_ADMIN_CLIENT_EMAIL.description: Firebase Admin SDK service account email

FIREBASE_ADMIN_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Firebase Admin SDK private key (base64 encoded or raw)

WHOP_API_KEY.description: Whop API key for payment and membership management

STRIPE_SECRET_KEY.description: Stripe secret key for server-side payment processing

N8N_BASE_URL.description: Base URL for n8n workflow automation instance

N8N_API_KEY.description: n8n API key for triggering workflows

N8N_WEBHOOK_BASE.description: Base URL for n8n webhook receivers

MAILERLITE_API_KEY.description: MailerLite API key for email automation

SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL.description: Slack incoming webhook URL for notifications

DISCORD_WEBHOOK_URL.description: Discord webhook URL for alert notifications

ADMIN_API_KEY.description: Admin API key for internal/admin endpoints

CRON_SECRET.description: Secret token for cron job authentication

BACKUP_BUCKET.description: GCS bucket name for data backups
